Text:
I have very fond memories of this, thank you so much for offering it.
Eccleston really stamped his remarkable acting talent on this piece!
And what a piece!
...I hope we've not lost the seeder already!

I have just found this torrent on another site that was copied identically. I am grabbing it now and I will have it in full in 20 mins. I'll seed for as long as I can seeing as the original uploader has forgotten how to :).......j/ks thanks all

Thanks for this. 

A/7
V/7

I think this is british TV drama at its finest. It's right up there with Barry Hine's 'Threads' and Alan Bleasdale's 'Boys From The Blackstuff'. It's not perfect, it could have benefitted from a lengthier script, but it's more interesting, thought provoking and entertaining than 99% of the feeble dross (mostly U.S. dross) that gets TV/advertising execs and other assorted morons so aroused.
